data.description:
ARTPuzzle allows you to immerse yourself in the exciting world of art and collect puzzles with iconic works of famous masters. From mesmerizing Renaissance masterpieces to Kandinsky's captivating abstraction, each puzzle offers a unique and immersive exploration of artistic genius.

With a wide range of difficulty levels, you can challenge yourself with puzzles of varying difficulty, from beginner to expert. Choose from different shapes of puzzle pieces adding an extra layer of excitement and complexity to your gameplay.

Immerse yourself in art galleries representing different genres of painting, each with its own unique atmosphere and carefully selected masterpieces. By solving puzzles, you will also gain fascinating information about each piece of art, expanding your knowledge and appreciating the world's most outstanding artistic treasures.

Key Features:

- 5 galleries containing more than 50 puzzles
- a wide range of difficulty levels from 12 pieces to 450 pieces
- various shapes of puzzle pieces, including classic puzzle pieces, hexagons and custom shaped pieces

ARTPuzzle is not just a game, it's an educational journey that brings art to life in a new way. Whether you're an art enthusiast, a puzzle lover, or just looking for a unique and addictive experience, this game is sure to captivate and inspire you.
